Reviews.Title: Great for my kid
Reviews.Author: lachellelawson
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my five year old who loves to take pictures and make videos the quality of the pictures aren't great but for a 5 year old its awesome .

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Diemkingdom
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, only think i didn't like is you can't pause while doing the video. and when i uploaded to utube it had no color only lines going across the bottom, even though i could view it just fine on my computer. Overall, for the price it wasn't bad, but the not greatest.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present for 8 year old
Reviews.Author: Brian Curnow
Reviews.Content: My kid absolutely loved this camera.  He would rate it 5 stars.  Extremely simple to use but takes very low quality pictures.  I knew this going into it.  For a cheap camera- the price is right .  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Feels like a cheap plastic toy
Reviews.Author: Amanda Fallon
Reviews.Content: I probably should have read through the reviews before I purchased this product. I don't have an optical drive so I can't install the drivers or whatever is on the disc and it feels like it came out of a cracker jack box. I'm giving this to my 7 year old for her 8th birthday since I can't send it back for a refund. The description seems misleading in a way.  It was definitely not worth $25, and someone had reviewed and said he tried to upload a video to YouTube and got nothing but lines. Buyers beware!

Reviews.Title: Less than enthused
Reviews.Author: Jen91
Reviews.Content: It will work for what I need it for. However be careful where you get this, I recieved mine new with scratched up screens, there was obvious dinks and issues with the outside of the camera. I have never bought something new with so many visual issues.

Reviews.Title: Say Cheese....
Reviews.Author: dustyrose56
Reviews.Content: perfect gift for a young child who loves to use the "good" camera and recorder for their own use. small enough to fit in little hands and the quality is good, delivery was on time and the price was right

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: KensaiEd
Reviews.Content: My two children (8 & 12) received this for Yule and love it. They have made many a video for us and their friends and it was worth the small price.Pros: Easy to use, very light, good for young(er) kidsCons: Feels cheap, quality is "OK" at bestNot bad for the cost and an additional fee for the memory card, just don't expect it to be perfect and you will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: Just a tree ornament
Reviews.Author: Ziana M "Ziana Mitchell"
Reviews.Content: I bought this item brand new never opened. However, when I put the two AA batteries and SDHC 8gb card, and turned it on, it never goes past the "powered on" scene. Which in my case is a bright white screen that says "JAZZ".  It doesn't turn off the way it is suppose to, i have to take one battery out to turn it off. I can do nothing with it.It is basically just a tree ornament that looks like a camera.

Reviews.Title: unsatisfied
Reviews.Author: Rose Soles
Reviews.Content: I was not satisfied with this product but kept it bc I didnt want hassle sending back nd takes forever to get ur money back

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Candice H Brown
Reviews.Content: Blurry screen. I cannot connect to my computer and cannot find driver on the internet. My 9 year old prefers a phone camera to this thing.

Reviews.Title: broken
Reviews.Author: Michelle Badger
Reviews.Content: broke like 3 seconds after i got it, and takes bad pictures. So yeah... not a good idea to buy.

Reviews.Title: Terrible product!
Reviews.Author: Peanut Butter
Reviews.Content: If I could give zero stars, I would. Bought this for my kid, he even hated it. You can't even see the image on the digital screen to take the picture. Then when you take the picture, a very blurry image appears, and it is totally indiscernible.

Reviews.Title: NEVER WORKED!  Piece of JUNK!
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: It never got past the opening screen and was frozen.  Had to take batteries out to even get it to turn off.  I do not recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Terrible photo quality
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for here. The photo quality is terrible and the camera itself is poorly manufactured. If you just want something cheap that takes pictures, regardless of how good they are, then go for it. But I wouldn't recommend it to anyone who wants nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: Not Worth It!
Reviews.Author: SpiritBeing
Reviews.Content: This purchase was a waste of $21.00!!! The microphone sux really bad!! You can't even tell there is a microphone!!! And Zooming out is a joke!! Zoomed out all the way doesn't even fit my whole head in the frame, shouldn't that be what it looks like zoomed in??? Don't buy this product!!!! I regret this purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for youngster first camera
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my six year old granddaughter. She loves both the camera and video and takes it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: D. R. Heck
Reviews.Content: Junk if i could give it no stars I would. Felt like a toy Sent it back to store !!

Reviews.Title: Its great for my teenager...... she loves it!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mrsthickem
Reviews.Content: This is my teenagers first camera.....I could not have chosen a better camera! she has it with her all the time and she says it so easy to hook up to her laptop and facebook. Every pic is always sent to facebook but any it is great!

ProductInfo.Features:
1.44" swivel LCD display allows you to shoot and review your footage on a bright screen
Movie Resolution: 640 x 480
Share on Facebook and YouTube
Powered by 2 x AA batteries
Compatible with SD memory cards - No internal memory
ProductInfo.Name: Jazz Red Z5 Video Recorder with Camera, Color Lcd, You Tube Ready, Facebook, Flickr, and Myspace
